config.display_name: McCain Foods Manufacturing Quality & OEE Optimization - Genie AI-BI
config.description: Genie space for mccain_ebc demo with curated questions and SQL instructions

instructions.title: Notes
instructions.content:
This Genie space supports near-real-time manufacturing monitoring and optimization across McCain plants and lines. It focuses on blend intake quality vs Product Specific Specifications (PSS), OSI PI end-of-line quality, OEE performance and downtime, and financial impact from over- and under-quality.

Use gold tables for fast answers to executive KPIs and anomaly detection:
- gold_line_hourly_quality: Hourly dry solids (proxy for dry matter), defect points, fry color shares, and flags for under/over quality using a 0.3pp tolerance on PSS min/max.
- gold_line_hourly_metrics: Daily aggregation of blend DM vs target and hours in breach by line/product.
- gold_quality_weekly: Weekly rollups by plant with hours_under_quality and hours_over_quality.
- gold_oee_kpis: Daily OEE KPIs per plant/line with performance proxy and downtime minutes.
- gold_cost_exposure: Daily cost estimates for over-quality waste and downgrade/rework exposure.
- gold_cumulative_costs: Cumulative raw spend and over-quality waste by region.
- gold_change_alignment: Hourly alignment of quality flags with downtime categories to correlate quality drift with maintenance/cleaning, including cutter-specific codes.

Business logic highlights:
- Under-quality if dry_solids_pct < min_dry_matter_pct - 0.3pp; over-quality if dry_solids_pct > max_dry_matter_pct + 0.3pp (per PSS tolerance).
- Over-quality cost waste uses regional cost curve: delta_DM * k_region * tons; under-quality exposure uses rework_factor_region * tons. EU-NL-P03 L2 SC-9mm shows sustained over-quality; NA-ID-P01 L3 CC-13mm shows under-quality aligned to cutter downtime (DOW-PI-4521, DOW-PI-4574).
- OEE performance dips around downtime clusters; weekends typically lower throughput.

Data quality considerations:
- Some demo tables have limited or placeholder dates (e.g., date sparsity in gold_cost_exposure and gold_cumulative_costs). Use weekly/daily aggregates for trend context.
- silver-level detail tables are available for root cause tracing (supplier loads, equipment inventories, raw OSI PI events). When detailed tracing is needed, cross-reference silver_oee_events and silver_line_quality_events_osipi.

Tip: Start with gold_line_hourly_quality to find deviation windows, use gold_change_alignment to correlate specific downtime categories, and quantify financial impacts via gold_cost_exposure. For scenario actions, consult gold_scenario_recommendations and silver_line_equipment to understand upgrade rationales.

While providing the output ignore <name>, </name>

instructions.title: Hourly quality deviations vs PSS by line
instructions.content:
-- Identify hours flagged under/over quality by plant/line/product
SELECT date, hour, plant_name, plant_line, product_name,
       dry_solids_pct,
       min_dry_matter_pct, max_dry_matter_pct,
       under_quality_flag, over_quality_flag
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_line_hourly_quality
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY plant_name, plant_line, product_name, date, hour;

instructions.title: Daily blend intake DM vs target (aggregated)
instructions.content:
-- Daily average blend DM and hours in breach by plant/line
SELECT date, plant_name, plant_line, product_name,
       AVG(blend_dm_pct) AS avg_blend_dm_pct,
       SUM(hours_under_quality) AS hours_under_quality,
       SUM(hours_over_quality) AS hours_over_quality
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_line_hourly_metrics
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
GROUP BY date, plant_name, plant_line, product_name
ORDER BY plant_name, plant_line, product_name, date;

instructions.title: Cost exposure (over-quality vs downgrade/rework)
instructions.content:
-- Daily cost exposure by plant/product
SELECT plant_name, region, product_name, date,
       tons_processed, avg_dry_matter_pct,
       over_quality_waste_usd, downgrade_rework_exposure_usd,
       raw_potato_spend_usd
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cost_exposure
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY plant_name, product_name, date;

instructions.title: OEE daily KPIs and performance around deviations
instructions.content:
-- OEE KPIs per plant/line; joinable to quality dates
SELECT date, plant_name, plant_line, event_count, total_downtime_min,
       run_duration_min, qty_packed_kg, num_totes_on, oee_performance
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_oee_kpis
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY plant_name, plant_line, date;

instructions.title: Align downtime categories with quality flags
instructions.content:
-- Hourly alignment of quality flags to downtime categories
SELECT date, hour, plant_name, plant_line, product_name,
       dry_solids_pct, under_quality_flag, over_quality_flag,
       downtime_cat_1, downtime_cat_2, duration_min, downtime_min
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_change_alignment
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY plant_name, plant_line, product_name, date, hour;

instructions.title: Notes
instructions.content:
This Genie space supports near-real-time monitoring and optimization of potato processing quality and OEE for McCain Foods across NA and EU plants. Use gold tables for fast answers: daily line aggregates, cost exposure, OEE KPIs, cumulative spend/waste, and alignment of hourly quality flags to downtime. Blend intake dry solids percent (proxy for dry matter) and PSS thresholds classify under-/over-quality using a 0.3pp tolerance. Over-quality implies avoidable raw cost; under-quality increases defect-driven rework/downgrade risk.

Core business logic:
- Under-quality: blend DM below min_dry_matter_pct - tolerance; Over-quality: above max_dry_matter_pct + tolerance
- Cost exposure uses k_region coefficients for over_quality_waste_usd and rework_factor_region for downgrade_rework_exposure_usd
- OEE KPIs aggregate downtime minutes, run duration, quantity packed, and a performance proxy; weekends typically -10% throughput
- Downtime codes like cutter maintenance (e.g., DOW-PI-4521, DOW-PI-4574) align with NA-ID-P01 L3 under-quality during 2025-08-22..2025-09-05
- Scenario recommendations propose load reallocation and equipment upgrades with expected savings and quality delta

Data quality notes:
- Some date fields in cost exposure are demo-populated; rely on gold_date_spine for consistent bucketing when needed
- OSI PI hourly signals map dry_solids_pct to dry matter; slight differences vs load dry_matter_pct may exist
- OEE end_time parsing in silver had occasional format issues, handled in gold KPIs

Prefer gold tables for KPI questions and dashboards. Use silver tables only for deep dives when needed.

instructions.title: Daily Blend DM vs Target by Line and SKU
instructions.content:
-- Use gold_line_hourly_metrics for daily aggregates powering the DM vs target chart
SELECT date, plant_name, plant_line, product_name, blend_dm_pct, hours_under_quality, hours_over_quality, defect_points
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_line_hourly_metrics
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY date, plant_name, plant_line, product_name;

instructions.title: Cost Exposure: Over-Quality Waste and Downgrade/Rework
instructions.content:
-- Use gold_cost_exposure to quantify financial impacts by plant/product
SELECT plant_name, region, product_name, date, tons_processed, avg_dry_matter_pct,
       over_quality_waste_usd, downgrade_rework_exposure_usd, raw_potato_spend_usd
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cost_exposure
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY date, plant_name, product_name;

instructions.title: OEE KPIs Around Deviation Window
instructions.content:
-- Use gold_oee_kpis to analyze daily OEE metrics per plant line
SELECT date, plant_name, plant_line, total_downtime_min, run_duration_min,
       qty_packed_kg, num_totes_on, oee_performance
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_oee_kpis
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY date, plant_name, plant_line;

instructions.title: Correlate Hourly Quality Flags with Downtime Categories
instructions.content:
-- Join change alignment to see hourly under/over-quality against downtime categories
SELECT date, hour, plant_name, plant_line, product_name, dry_solids_pct,
       under_quality_flag, over_quality_flag, downtime_cat_1, downtime_cat_2,
       duration_min, downtime_min
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_change_alignment
WHERE date BETWEEN '2025-08-18' AND '2025-09-12'
ORDER BY date, hour, plant_name, plant_line;

instructions.title: Scenario Recommendations with Savings and Rationale
instructions.content:
-- Use gold_scenario_recommendations to surface actions for human-in-the-loop review
SELECT recommendation_id, type, plant_name, plant_line,
       expected_savings_usd, expected_quality_delta_pp, confidence, rationale
FROM demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_scenario_recommendations
ORDER BY expected_savings_usd DESC;

tile.name: DBGEN_McCain_Manufacturing_Optimization_Assistant
tile.creator: brian.lui@databricks.com
tile.description: Assistant for McCain Foods demo that answers questions about equipment manuals, performance specs, and product quality specifications to support detection, cost impact, and scenario planning across plants and lines.
tile.instructions: You are a professional assistant that uses the indexed equipment manuals and PSS quality specifications to answer questions about line configurations, rated throughput, maintenance procedures, error codes, and SKU targets. When asked, cite relevant equipment specs (e.g., rated t/h, efficiency thresholds), error codes (e.g., DOW-PI-45xx), and PSS targets (dry matter %, defects %, fry color ranges, tolerance bands). Provide concise, actionable responses and clarify assumptions if the documents do not specify details. Do not invent specs; use only the indexed content. If a question mixes plant events with manuals/specs, answer from the manuals/specs and note where operational data would be needed.

examples.question: What is the rated throughput and maintenance procedure for the cutter at NA-ID-P01 L3?
guidelines: The answer should include the rated throughput value of 8.5 t/h and mention routine maintenance steps or error codes listed in the manual.

examples.question: How do you calculate the hourly blend dry matter and determine if it is under or over the specified target?
guidelines: The answer should mention the weighted sum of load DMs, the target thresholds, and the classification criteria.

examples.question: How does raw potato dry matter influence cost per ton and what is the expected average quality?
guidelines: The answer should explain the approximate 21.5% average DM and describe the cost curve increasing above 21% dry matter, referencing the data in the document.

examples.question: How did the load quality distribution from supplier S7 change starting August 17, 2025?
guidelines: The answer should describe the shift to higher dry matter loads from S7, referencing the date and distribution change.

examples.question: What are the typical OEE performance ranges and how are downtime events classified?
guidelines: The answer should mention the performance thresholds, typical OEE values, and referencing specific downtime codes such as DOW-PI-4521.

examples.question: What are typical defect rates and fry color ranges considered acceptable at end-of-line?
guidelines: The answer should include the approximate defect rates of 1.4-2.2% and fry color median classes of 2-3, indicating acceptable ranges.

examples.question: What are the dry matter target and defect thresholds for the SC-9mm SKU?
guidelines: The answer should mention the 21.8% dry matter target with a 0.3pp tolerance and defect rate thresholds as specified in the document.

examples.question: What are the key considerations for reallocation of high-DM loads and equipment upgrades based on the scenario plan?
guidelines: The answer should identify feasibility factors, potential OEE improvements, and how to balance load quality with line capacity.

examples.question: What are the recommended troubleshooting steps for error codes DOW-PI-4521 and DOW-PI-4574?
guidelines: The answer should outline the troubleshooting process and maintenance actions related to the specific error codes.

examples.question: What is the rated capacity and main maintenance considerations for the fryer at EU-NL-P03 P2?
guidelines: The answer should specify the 6.0 t/h capacity and refer to maintenance or error code information relevant to the fryer.

tile.name: DBGEN_McCain_Manufacturing_Optimization_Multi_Agent_Assistant
tile.creator: brian.lui@databricks.com
tile.description: AI supervisor for McCain Foods demo that coordinates data analysis (Genie) and documentation Q&A (Knowledge Assistant) to detect quality deviations, quantify cost exposure, align with OEE/downtime, and suggest scenario actions (load reallocation, equipment upgrades). Focus period 2025-07-10..2025-10-31 with key window 2025-08-18..2025-09-12.
tile.instructions: You are the supervisor for a manufacturing optimization assistant. Route quantitative, data-driven questions (metrics, trends, aggregations, joins, time-series) to Genie. Route policy/procedure/specification questions to the Knowledge Assistant. For complex prompts that ask both “what happened” and “what should we do per policy,” coordinate both agents: first use Genie to extract facts (dates, lines, metrics, events), then invoke KA to retrieve the relevant PSS thresholds, error code meanings, or maintenance procedures, and synthesize a concise answer. Always respect the demo’s data boundaries (2025-07-10..2025-10-31) and use exact table and column names when forming data questions. Maintain a clear, action-oriented tone oriented to detection, root-cause alignment, quantified impact, and feasible scenario actions.

agents.name: Knowledge Assistant
agents.description:
Knowledge Assistant indexes the PDF collection: equipment_manuals_and_quality_specs (10 documents, ~6 pages each). Document types include: equipment manuals (cutter, fryer, washer, sorter, freezer) with rated throughput specs (e.g., CUT-2000 8.5 t/h, FRY-XL 6.0 t/h), efficiency thresholds, maintenance steps, troubleshooting/error codes (e.g., DOW-PI-45xx), and Product Specific Specifications (PSS) quality documents listing SKU targets and tolerance bands (e.g., dry matter targets such as 21.8% ±0.3pp for SC-9mm), downgrading protocols, and QA procedures.

KA can answer:
- Definitions and thresholds from PSS: min/max dry matter %, defect caps, fry color acceptable ranges, tolerance bands, and downgrade/rework protocols.
- Equipment capabilities: rated throughput by equipment type/model, maintenance steps, common failure modes, and error code meanings (e.g., what DOW-PI-4521 indicates; how to address DOW-PI-4574).
- Procedure/how-to: steps to adjust blending to meet PSS targets; guidelines for handling under-/over-quality situations; maintenance/inspection procedures for cutters/fryers to stabilize throughput and quality.
- Policy/controls: human-in-the-loop review requirements for scenario changes, approved potato varieties lists per SKU/line as documented in PSS.

Typical question types:
- “What is the target and tolerance for dry matter on SC-9mm and CC-13mm?”
- “What are the maintenance and troubleshooting steps for CUT-2000 when throughput drops?”
- “What do error codes DOW-PI-4521 and DOW-PI-4574 refer to and what is the corrective action?”
- “What is the downgrading protocol when defect points exceed the cap?”

agents.name: Genie Data Explorer
agents.description:
Genie is a SQL/data exploration agent connected to demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc silver/gold tables. It can run aggregations, joins, filters, window functions, and time-series analysis to answer manufacturing quality, OEE, and cost questions tied to the demo timeline.

Available tables and key columns:
- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_line_hourly_quality
  Columns: datetime STRING, date DATE, hour INT, week_start TIMESTAMP, plant_id BIGINT, plant_name STRING, plant_line STRING, product_name STRING, variety STRING, avg_length_mm BIGINT, usda_color_0..4 BIGINT, total_defect_points BIGINT, dry_solids_pct DOUBLE, fry_color_0_share..fry_color_4_share DOUBLE, min_dry_matter_pct DOUBLE, max_dry_matter_pct DOUBLE, under_quality_flag BOOLEAN, over_quality_flag BOOLEAN.
  Uses: detect hourly under-/over-quality vs PSS thresholds (0.3pp tolerance baked into flags), compute persistence windows, deviation magnitudes (dry_solids_pct - min/max thresholds), by plant/line/product.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_line_hourly_metrics
  Columns: date, plant_name, plant_line, product_name, blend_dm_pct DOUBLE, defect_points DOUBLE, hours_under_quality BIGINT, hours_over_quality BIGINT.
  Uses: daily aggregations of hourly quality; trend lines of blend DM vs targets by line.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_quality_weekly
  Columns: week_start, plant_name, avg_dry_solids_pct, avg_defect_points, fry_color_class_mode INT, hours_under_quality BIGINT, hours_over_quality BIGINT.
  Uses: weekly plant-level defects and breach counts; bar charts by plant.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_oee_kpis
  Columns: date, plant_name, plant_line, event_count BIGINT, total_downtime_min DOUBLE, run_duration_min DOUBLE, qty_packed_kg DOUBLE, num_totes_on DOUBLE, oee_performance DOUBLE.
  Uses: OEE performance trends, availability/performance proxies, correlation to quality deviations.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_oee_events
  Columns: event_id STRING, plant_name STRING, plant_line STRING, event_time TIMESTAMP, duration_min DOUBLE, downtime_min DOUBLE, component STRING, code STRING, notes STRING.
  Uses: trace specific downtime codes (e.g., DOW-PI-4521, DOW-PI-4574) affecting NA-ID-P01 L3 during 2025-08-22..2025-09-05.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_oee_production_runs_and_downtime_events
  Columns: datetime STRING, date DATE, week_start TIMESTAMP, plant_id BIGINT, plant_name STRING, plant_line STRING, downtime_cat_1 STRING, downtime_cat_2 STRING, product_name STRING, start_time STRING, end_time_ts TIMESTAMP, duration_min DOUBLE, downtime_min DOUBLE, qty_packed DOUBLE, num_totes_on DOUBLE.
  Uses: derive downtime clusters by category; join to quality anomalies by date/week_start.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_change_alignment
  Columns: date, hour, plant_name, plant_line, product_name, dry_solids_pct, under_quality_flag, over_quality_flag, downtime_cat_1, downtime_cat_2, duration_min DOUBLE, downtime_min DOUBLE.
  Uses: correlate hourly quality anomalies with OEE downtime categories.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cost_exposure
  Columns: plant_name, region, product_name, date, tons_processed DOUBLE, avg_dry_matter_pct DOUBLE, over_quality_waste_usd DOUBLE, downgrade_rework_exposure_usd DOUBLE, raw_potato_spend_usd DOUBLE.
  Uses: daily cost implications; compute last-30-day counters and regional contributions.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_counter_total_tons_last_30d
  Column: total_tons_last_30d DOUBLE.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_counter_raw_potato_spend_last_30d
  Column: raw_potato_spend_last_30d_usd DOUBLE.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_counter_oee_performance_avg_last_7d
  Column: oee_performance_avg_last_7d DOUBLE.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_counter_downgrade_rework_last_30d
  Column: downgrade_rework_exposure_last_30d_usd DOUBLE.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cumulative_costs
  Columns: date DATE, region STRING, cumulative_spend_usd DOUBLE, cumulative_over_quality_waste_usd DOUBLE.
  Uses: regional cumulative curves to highlight EU vs NA contributions.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_line_quality_events_osipi
  Columns: datetime, date, hour, week_start, plant_id, plant_name, product_id, product_name, variety, avg_length_mm, usda_color_0..4, total_defect_points, dry_solids_pct, fry_color_0_share..fry_color_4_share.
  Uses: raw hourly line quality signals.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_potato_load_quality
  Columns: plant_id, plant_name, variety, load_number, arrival_date, tons DOUBLE, average_length_grading_mm, usda_color_0_share..usda_color_4_share DOUBLE, total_defect_points BIGINT, dry_matter_pct DOUBLE.
  Uses: supplier/load quality shifts (e.g., higher DM starting 2025-08-17); align to plant for blend explanations.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_product_specifications_pss
  Columns: plant_id, plant_name, plant_line, product_id, product_name, average_length_grading_mm_min/target/max, pct_min_50mm_length, pct_min_75mm_length, max_usda_color_0..4, max_defect_points, min_dry_matter_pct, max_dry_matter_pct, approved_potato_varieties ARRAY<STRING>.
  Uses: PSS thresholds and targets used to classify under/over quality.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_line_equipment
  Columns: plant_id, plant_name, plant_line, equipment_id, equipment_type, equipment_description, equipment_rated_throughput_tph, commission_date, equipment_age_years, effective_rated_throughput_tph.
  Uses: equipment constraints/age and throughput for scenario planning context.

- demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_date_spine
  Columns: date, dow, is_weekend, week_start; for consistent time bucketing.

Key KPIs and calculations Genie can compute:
- Deviation from PSS: dry_solids_pct - min_dry_matter_pct or dry_solids_pct - max_dry_matter_pct; breach counts and persistence.
- Over-/Under-quality hours per line and date; daily blend_dm_pct trends vs targets.
- OEE metrics: total_downtime_min, oee_performance, qty_packed_kg trends; alignment with downtime_cat_1/2 and codes.
- Cost metrics: over_quality_waste_usd, downgrade_rework_exposure_usd, raw_potato_spend_usd; last-30-day counters; cumulative costs by region/date.
- Event alignment for 2025-08-18..2025-09-12 at EU-NL-P03 L2 (over-quality) and NA-ID-P01 L3 (under-quality), including downtime codes and defect spikes.

Business questions Genie can answer:
- When did each line deviate from PSS and by how many pp? Which lines are persistent over-/under-quality?
- What are daily/weekly trends of blend DM, defects, and OEE performance by plant/line/SKU?
- What downtime categories/codes correlate with NA-ID-P01 L3 under-quality during 2025-08-22..2025-09-05?
- What are the raw potato spend, over-quality waste, and downgrade/rework exposure by plant/region during 2025-08-18..2025-09-12?
- Which region contributed most to cumulative over-quality waste, and how much came from EU-NL-P03?

Genie supports: filtering by date range, region/plant/line/product, windowed aggregations, joins across gold_change_alignment, gold_oee_kpis, gold_cost_exposure, silver_oee_events, and time-series breakdowns.

examples.question: Correlate hourly under_quality_flag at NA-ID-P01 L3 with downtime_cat_2 containing 'Cutter' using demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_change_alignment for 2025-08-18..2025-09-12.
For NA-ID-P01 L3, list all downtime events and codes from 2025-08-22 to 2025-09-05 from demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.silver_oee_events, and compute total downtime_min.
What does error code DOW-PI-4521 indicate in the manuals, and what maintenance steps are recommended to restore cutter throughput?
What are the approved potato varieties for CC-13mm in the PSS docs, and what is the downgrading protocol when dry matter falls below min_dry_matter_pct?
Which region contributed most to cumulative_over_quality_waste_usd by 2025-09-12, based on demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cumulative_costs?
What are the PSS min_dry_matter_pct, max_dry_matter_pct, and tolerance for SC-9mm and CC-13mm according to the equipment_manuals_and_quality_specs collection?
Provide weekly hours_over_quality and hours_under_quality by plant_name from demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_quality_weekly for August 2025.
Using demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_oee_kpis, how did oee_performance trend for NA-ID-P01 L3 during 2025-08-18..2025-09-12, and what was the average qty_packed_kg?
Show daily over_quality_waste_usd and raw_potato_spend_usd for EU-NL-P03 by product_name during 2025-08-18..2025-09-12 using demo_generator.brian_lui_mccain_ebc.gold_cost_exposure.
Between 2025-08-18 and 2025-09-12, which plant lines had the highest number of over_quality_flag hours and what was the average dry_solids_pct during those hours?

manufacturing_quality_oee_cost.title: Production Quality, OEE, and Cost Exposure
